title: ASUS ZenBook UX360CA Flip Review - Flippin' Heck!
description:
The ASUS ZenBook UX360CA Flip is a 13-inch ultraportable notebook with a 360° hinge allowing you to flip it round and use it as a tablet. But should you buy this $750/£750 core m3 powered convertible laptop?
Buy:
US: http://www.amazon.com/dp/B01GHQOD8U/?tag=techchap-20
UK: http://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B01GHQOD8U/?tag=techchap-21

Thanks for watching - Like, Share & Subscribe :)
